Uses of Package
ObjectronExceptions

  • Packages that use ObjectronExceptions 
    Package Description
    ObjectronExceptions  
    controllers  
    item.lightgrenade  
    player  
  • Classes in ObjectronExceptions used by ObjectronExceptions 
    Class and Description
    IllegalActionException
    Thrown to indicate that an Player has invoked an action-method when he's not allowed to do so.
    IllegalMoveException
    Thrown to indicate a player could not finish his move.
    IllegalPickUpException
    Thrown to indicate an item could not successfully be picked up.
  • Classes in ObjectronExceptions used by controllers 
    Class and Description
    IllegalMoveException
    Thrown to indicate a player could not finish his move.
    IllegalPickUpException
    Thrown to indicate an item could not successfully be picked up.
    IllegalUseException
    Thrown to indicate something wend wrong when someone tried to use an Item.
    InventoryAlreadyContainsFlagException
    Exception that is thrown when a player tries to pick up a flag while his or her inventory already contains a flag.
    InventoryFullException
    Thrown to indicate the item to be picked up can not be added to the Players Inventory (because it has reached its maximum).
  • Classes in ObjectronExceptions used by item.lightgrenade 
    Class and Description
    IllegalUseException
    Thrown to indicate something wend wrong when someone tried to use an Item.
  • Classes in ObjectronExceptions used by player 
    Class and Description
    IllegalActionException
    Thrown to indicate that an Player has invoked an action-method when he's not allowed to do so.
    IllegalMoveException
    Thrown to indicate a player could not finish his move.
